page.title: 01LIVING IN THE COUNTRY
page.content:
The position of our area is in the north of{Scotland.}The nearest town is{Turriff}which is about 7 miles from here. There are lots of{lorries}and {tractors}on the roads. There is only one main road in our area. It goes from{Turriff}to{Huntly.}The land is fairly flat but we do have some hills. The highest point is{738}feet above see level. There are some wooded areas which are mainly{conifers.}We have many fields wich are owned by farmers. These are used for{sheep, cattle, {barley, turnips,}and other{crops.}Most people here are connected with the land. The majority enjoy living in the country but some find it too quiet.
{**** LUKE DREWETT**** { **(AGE 12)**
